div.head: Copia
div.p:
Vniuersis et singulis presentes litteras inspecturis prepositus ballivi counsules et nonnulli communitatis burgi de
Abirdene corpus dicti opidi pro tempore representantes salutem in domino Noueritis nos vnanimj consensu
et assensu dedisse concessisse assignasse et liberaliter contulisse dilecto nostro viro vtiusque vtriusque
benemerito magistro Alexandro fife capellano illam capellaniam nostram altaris Sancte marie
virginis gloriosissime dei genitricis in ecclesia parrochiali beati nicholaij dicti burgi situati vacantem per
mortem quondam dominj Andree seres vltimi capellanj et possessorum eiusdem ad nostram presentacionem
et aliam omnem et omnimoda disposicionem pleno Jure spectantem / pro toto tempore vite sue et consuetis admi
nistraturo cum possessione prefate capellane altaris prenotati debite exequenda Mandantes
presencium serie litterarum omnibus et singulis quibus interest intererit aut interesse poterit nostris conuicinis
quatenus eidem magistro Alexandro uel suo procuratori cuicumque de vniuersis et singulis fructibus redditibus
prouentibus obuencionibus oblacionibus emolumentis Juribusque et pertinenciis capellane dicti
altaris beate marie in statutis annj terminis penthicostes et Sancti martinj in hieme proporcionabi
liter vt solito prompte respondeant pareant et intendant / pro quibus eidem potestatem et autoritatem nostram
committimus presencium per tenorem quoscumque namandj et distringendi si forte tempore in futuro in solucione
fructuum aut redditum quorumcumque dicte capellanie pertinencium aut pertinere valencium quomodolibet
in futuris tardi ingrati aut neglecti videbuntur aut fuerint quoquomodo In quorum omnium et
singulorum fidem et testimonium premissorum Sigillum nostrum commune huic presenti nostre donacionj
apud dictum magistrum Alexandrum perpetuo remansure est appensum apud Abirdene deciam die
mensis Decembris Anno Dominj Millesimo iiijcmo lxxxiiijto

The last dai of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij / the Aldirman and counsale fand and
deliuerit the decreit of certane arbitrouris made betuix Johne litstar' on the
ta part / and Androw vaus' on the tothir part / anent the said androwis clame of xlvj s' and in
al vthir poyntis contenit in it / of vail eftir the tenour and fourm of the samyn And has
ordanit be verteu of the said decrete that Androw vaus sal content and pay to the
said Johne litstar for his costis and expens' sen the said action' and caus' was endit
be ane assise of before vij s' and vj d' like as the said Johne has deponit
be his aith tharuppon

Wil gillis' was adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wrangwis' borgh stre
kin on Cornelis Kel / that he wranguisly intromettit with a barrel of Sal
mond / and the said cornelis quyte of his clame be the deliuerance of the aldir
man and consale of this burgh

the assise has ordanit that Dauid spens sal mak compt rekning and payment
til the wif of William Wenton' webstar of xiij eln' of clath price of the eln iij s'
And quhat he has pait tharof / salbe allowit in the sammyn sowme

the samyn dai the assise ordanit / that Dauid spens sal content and pay til Androw Wenton'
for ix eln' of canves xij s' within terme of law

The ferd dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij . It is ordanit and decretit be the aldirman
and counsale / that the talyouris and al vthiris crafttismen within the toune sal in tyme tocum
beyr thare takynnis of thare craft apon thare breistis in thare best aray on Candil
mes day at the offerand And quha that contempnis and dois nocht sal tyne thare fredum
for a yer'

The samyn dai the action movit be Dauid menyes yongar' procuratour for Androw androson on the
ta part / againis Androw murray eldar and Johne of glenmalvin on the tuthir partie / anent certane lott
clamyt be the said Dauid procuratour forsaid is resplatit be the assise sworn thareto
with consent of bath the parties in siclike fourme and effect / as it is now but preiudice of ony
party quhil monunday next tocum and than todeliuer thare decreit tharuppon And thir
ar the names of the said assise Robert blindsel Johne Wormot Richart of culan William
of Kyntor Dauid marr' alexander nachty Johne stewart William malisson thom symson
mawnis Wormot Sym of crafurd Dauid prat and alexander angusson'
Johne peet webstar in amerciament for the wrangwis' occupacion of fremenis craft et cetera
Symond his servand in amerciament the samyn caus'
Sande bevirlay webstar in amerciament rychtsua for the caus' forsaid

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem vijo die februa
rij anno Dominj supradicto /

Quo die Jacobus cvmyn secundo die vocatus ad sectam Ade androson pro iniusta detencione
precij quinque bollarum ordij ad bonum compotum ut patet in processu primj diei non comparuit / precipitur alexandro
chamer seriendo quod capto districto ab eodem Jacobo ipsum summoneat ad proximum diem legalem tanquam 3m
diem huius processus .

Thomas de fife super quem Willelmus moyses extendit plegium de iniusta detencione trium
librarum ab eo / secundo die vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur dicto seriendo
capere districtum de dicto thoma et cetera et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam
tercium diem processus

The action movit betuix Dauid menyes procuratour for androw andirson on the ta part / and
Androw murra eldar and Johne glenmaluin on the tudir part / anent certane lott / clamyt be
the said Dauid procuratour is continuit and resplatit be the assise with consent of bath the
parties quhil friday next tocum in siclike strinth force and effect as now And gif ony
person or persons of the assise beis absent the said dai that siclike person' salbe chosin with
consent of the parties

The ix dai of februar' the yer of god et cetera lxxxiiij In the court haldin be the ballies of the
burgh of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samyn personaly comperit Johne Williamson son and
ayr til vmquhile Richart Williamson citenar' of brechin / and thare in presence of the balye
is and vthiris of the counsale schew and exponit / that he was cumin to thare presence of free wil
and was at fredum / and withoute seducing of ony personis bot of his awne fre wil che
sit Johne dempstar of vchterles with consent of ser James Williamson tutour to the saide
child as he sais / and the said ser James him self his curatis coniunctly to govern him
his landis and gudis quhil he cum til lauchful age And the said Johne Williamson procurit
the seil of Dauid menyes ane of the said balyeis tobe affixt til ane letter of curatry
tobe made her'uppon And the said Johne dempstar askit the said ballies seil tobe af
fixt to the copy of this act / before thir witnes alexander menyes James lesly alexander chamer
yungar Johne of culan gilbert the vaus and vthiris sindry

James Kennarty convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament for breking of common ordi
nance at the offerand on candilmes day et cetera

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xj dai of februar' the yer'
of god aboue writin / Alexander menyes Johne of culan David symson Robert prat gilbert
vaus alexander trail / William gillis' / peter andreis / the skippar of the busch / copryng ster'man
of the busch / michael ster'man of the kervel gilbert morison and thom iameson chosin
and sworn in ane assise / decretit and deliuerit / that the merchandis gudis of the busch sal lott
with Waltir ane of the merchandis of the samyn schip of his gudis castin
And that the skippar of the said busch sal lot / with the merchandis of the quhilkis thare
gudis ar castin / outhir his schip or fraght

Item lang marion' convict be ane assise in amerciament for the wranguis' distrublance of alexander
chamer seriand and sal amend as law wil

The samyn dai Robert blindsel Johne Wormot Richart of culan William of Kintor Dauid
marr' alexander nachtie Johne stewart thom symson / mawnis Wormot Sym of craufurde
Dauid prat alexander angusson and Johne chepman chosin and sworn in ane assise in the actione
movit betuix Dauid menyes procuratour for Androw androson on the ta part / and Androw murray
eldar and Johne of glenmaluin for thame and thare complicis on the tuthir part / has decretit
and deliuerit in maner' and fourme as eftir folowis / that is tosay / that the said Androw murray and
Johne of glenmaluin with thare complicis sal cause and make al and hail the gudis pertening
til Androw andirson quhilkis war tayn oute be holandaris of James cantis kervel cum
mand til Abirdene in a harnes barrel / be brocht hame til Abirdene on thare ex
pens' and costis pund / pund like betuix this and mydsummyr dai next eftir folowand
the date of this write / and the said Androw andirson sal bere his part of the vprichting
of the said gudis pund / pund like as the lave of the merchandis dois / And that the said
merchandis sal mak the said gudis be brocht hame be the said day on thare aventur'
and expens' as said is to the avail and profite of the said Androw andirson and his procuratour And
this beand done the said androw murray Johne of glenmaluin and thare complicis salbe
quyte of al vthir expens' and costis and clames of lettres of summonis of the kingis or ony
vthir proces made of thaim before / for the caus' forsaid et cetera

Item the samen assise ordanit that James Kennarty sal pay the iiij s' taxit apon him be
the counsale of before but mare question' or demaund

Item that Wille andirson sal content and pay alexander menyes samekil salt as v mettis cumis
to / at his awne wil

Eodem die Inuentum fuit et deliberatum per assisam iuratum Roberto blindsel prelocutore quod Willelmus
gillis' magister sub deo cuiusdam nauis vocate maria de leith et suj marinj nullam
exhibuerunt diligenciam ad habendum bona per Duncanum cammal et Willelmum lory in eadem
carcata ad portum berwici ad quem dicta nauis conducta fuit / et quod dicta nauis
non fuit sufficiens ad carcandum huiusmodi bona ad portum antedictum Et quod prefati Duncanus
et Willelmus lory suam diligenciam in omnibus exhibuerunt et fecerunt ad causandum dictam
nauim portuj prenotato applicuisse pro vtilitate suorum magistrorum / et si dictus magister nauis
suam diligenciam in premissis fecisset / dicta bona ad forum peroptatum fuissent et cetera

The xv dai of februar the yer' et cetera lxxxiiij In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene
in the tolbuthe It was ordanit be ane sworn assise Jhone of Knollis forspekar that Wil
liam blindsel sal bring alexander sanchar of marr' this dai xv dais / and he and the said alexander
sal sweyr the gret athe that Dauid forbes gef him quyte xl s' of the rest of a
mare some' of his mariage geer' / And falyeand that the said Wilyam dois it nocht
he sal pay the said Dauid v merkis within xv dais thareftir And the samen assise de
liuerit that quhat the said William can preif lachfully the said dai his twa
hors' takin fra him be the said Dauid ar warrit and quhat scath the said Wil
liam has sustenit in the wanting of his hors' that the said Dauid sal wprycht and assithe
him tharof within terme of law And the said William has fundin William of Kyntor
borch for him for the payment of the xl s' til Dauid forbes falyeand of the production
of alexander sanchar to depone with him as said is

the samyn dai Thom prat androw culan alexander scrogis patrik andirson and allan smyth chosin and
sworn to pryse and consider the scaith of the said William blindselis hors' / has ordanit
that Dauid forbes sal haf the quhite hors hame with him again / and that he sal pay for
him til the said William xl s' and the tuthir hors tobe deliuerit til William blindsel
Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per balliuos xvjto die februarij Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

quo die Willelmus portar' fatebatur se debere nobili viro Alexandro Irvin de Drum summam
quinque librarum vsualis monete scocie / et penes solucionem dicte summe dictus alexander continuauit
terminum solucionis sub spe concordie ex desiderio ipsius Willelmum

the samen dai the action movit betuix William moyses and Johne Wormot anent the clame
of thre barellis of salmond clamit be the said William / the assise has deliuerit that
the said Johne salbring the obligacion betuix this and friday in the tolbuthe and deliuer it
to the said William moyses / and falyeand tharof he sal pay him thre barellis of
salmond of the quhilk thre thai fynd the said Johne awand to the said William
ane cler' tobe pait within terme of law / And the said obligacion beand producit and
brocht as said is the said Johne sal pay bot a barel as forsaid is
Willelmus garuiach et robertus coupar conuicti per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio adinuicem
Robertus Kyntor et alexander Irvin quilibet eorum in amerciamento pro perturbacione habita inter se et cetera

Curia tenta in pretorio de Abirdene per balliuos xviijo die februarij Anno Dominj et cetera
lxxxiiijto

The quhilk day is It is fundin be ane assis' that Jhone fichet sal mak
covnt and Rekning to Jhone of chavmer of sevin barrelis of salt as merchande to
merchand eftir the tenour of ane decret' And of this vij barrelis of Salt thar
is xxti s' pait

Item the samyn day Jhone Wormet presentit ane obligacion and deliuerit it to
the aldirman ande balyeis for the declaracion of the debatis betuix Wilyeam
moyses and the said Johne Wormet eftir the tenour of the act' precedent'
as it was ordanit be ane assise

The samyn day it is deliuerit be ane assise that Jhone moire sall
pay and content to Wat of auchnewe xiiijor s' g' and vj g' in the
erast schipis Ande tharof William balheluy sal freith' and relef the said
Jhone moire of fiwe s' g' In the saide schipis

The samyn day it was fundin be ane assise that Jhone Dauid prat is
quyt of the clame of xv s' clamit be Jhone moire for v twne fracht

the xix dai of februar yer' et cetera lxxxiiij the assise deliuerit and ordanit that the spous'
of vmquhile gilbert quhite sal cum on monundai next tocum in the tolbuthe and
prefe / that scho borowit the stethey clamit be thom Jerdan / fra ser matho necol
son' as he that had poyndit the samyn stethy for his annuel / and falyeand that scho
prefis nocht that scho sal deliuer the stethy to thom Jerdan
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xxjo die februarij anno quo supra

Quo die thomas de fife tercio die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi moyses pro iniusta detencione iij librarum
non comparuit / precipitur Duncano stralogh seriendo / quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum summoneat ad proximum
diem legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorium diem huius processus

Jacobus cvmyn tercio die vocatus ad sectam Ade andirson pro iniusta detencione precij vi bollarum ordij
ad bonum compotum et cetera non comparuit / Ideo precipitur dicto seriendo ut supra

Thomas pyot super quem patricius badenagh extendit plegium de iniusta detencione vjxx cartis
ploddis primo die vocatus non comparuit / precipitur D straloch capere districtum et cetera

the assise has ordanit thom Jerdyn to pay til ser matho necolson ij d' for ilke oulk that
the stethy was in the hous' that ser matho takis annuel of and the said ser matho to de
lyuer til thom ierdyn the stethy that beand payt

In curia tenta per ballivos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die mensis februarij predicti electi fue
runt in assisam Jacobus lesly Robertus blindsel Johannes de Knollis thomas de fife gilbertus vaus thomas
prat Johannes Wormot David mathei andreas culan adam de crafurd David marr' gilbertus morison
alexander hay andreas Wenton' magnus Wormot

the assise has ordanit that Johne malisson sal refund and pay til Jhon menyeis
viij s' g' and vj g' of waist fracht quhilk Johne menyeis payt for him in flandris
as the said Johne menyeis has deponit be his aith and tobe pait within terme of law

the samen dai the assise has ordanit and deliuerit that Duncan smyth sal pay til thom symson
xl s' of siluer betuix this and paisch next tocum / and a barrel of salmond at this new
fisching for the rest of a gret' some' acht til the said thomas for the tak of his wattir of
Done the said tak remanand with the said Duncan indurand the termes of the last general
assedacion

The xxv dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij Alexander nachty on the behalf of his wif
has tane to prefe this dai viij dais the payment of xxiiij s' ix d' clamyt be the
wideu of William malisson for certane malt boght be his wif fra vmquhile the
said Wilyam malisson'
Johne andirson in amerciament for the wranguis' halding of Wil anffrasonis pipe
the assise has ordanit Jhon howison to restore j cobil to thom gledstane

Wil of pantoun convict be the assise is adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' strublans
of the seik folk / and breking of thare durris and stopis / and to amend as law wil

the assise has deliuerit and ordanit because Ibbe the wife of Wil cardno dois nocht that
scho suld do in the resetting of trespassouris in scath of diuers' persons and specialy of mage
duelland with Wil bartilmo in the greyn convict of the wranguis' takin of certan siluer fra
a flemyn / gif evir the said Ibbe be convict of sic like thing in tym tocum that scho sal be bannyst
fra this toune with a croune of paper

And gif evyr the said mage be fundin committar' of sic trespas that scho salbe brynt on
the cheik with a key and bannyst as forsaid is

John' of pantoun in presence of the aldirman ballies and consale is becumin law borgh for Wil of pan
tone' and souerty vndir the pain of xx li' that the seik folk salbe vnscathit and vndistrublit of him
vthirwais than be way of law / And gif the said Johne wil entir the said Wil before
the aldirman and ballies in the tolbuthe this dai viij dais he salbe free of his borowgang
and gif he dois nocht / to stand furth borgh for him as said is
Curia tenta in pretorio de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvjto die mensis februarij predicti

quo die Johannes de pantoune per prelocutorem suum posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro iniusta pertur
bacione Willelmum mathoson vnde adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendare parti lese ad visum
proborum virorum

Thom symson has tayn tobe avisit quhil monunday cum xv dais tomak ansuer' outhir
to red his hous' or pay the mail to ser William of Knollis preceptour of torfichin or his procuratouris

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem vltimo die februarij
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

quo die Alexander de marr' cum suo prelocutore Jacobo lesly prosecutus
fuit per plegium Dauid marr' quod ipse Dauid minus iuste detinet a dicto alexandro summam
quinque librarum ad bonum compotum vel tot salmones sicut ipse alexander emisse potuit cum
tanto argento quj quidem Dauid peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et ballivi
assignaverunt eidem proximum diem legalem videlicet hodie ad octo dies

Eodem die Dauid spens calumpniavit alexandrum talyour de summa decem solidorum pro certo panno
ab eodem empto et quia dictus alexander in parte negavit huiusmodi summam Ideo ballivi ordinaverunt ipsum
Dauid Jurare quam ipse alexander sibi debet pro dicto panno / qui Juravit quod sibi debet
x s' quos ballivi precipiebant dictum alexandrum sibi soluere infra terminum Juris

the samyn dai the ballies assignit to William more this dai viij dais toansuer'
til William blindsel for demj last of hidis and ij barrelis of vnyonis clamyt be the said
Wilyam as merchand to merchand

In curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo die mensis marcij
anno Dominj supradicto Johannes de lammynton' calumpniavit per plegium patricium robertson de
iniusta intromissione et capcione vnius vacce eiusdem Johannis / vnde dictus patricius per suum
prelocutorem peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio . et assignatum fuit sibi hodie ad
xvnam / plegio alexandro nachtie pro introitu dicti patricij illo die responsurus et Juri pariturus
Et dictus Johannes constituit alexandrum chamer filium et patricium badenach procuratores suos coniunctim et divisim in dicta causa promittens Rato et cetera

the samen dai Androw branche ane of the ballies chargit philp of Dunbrek be his
awne graunt todeliuer til William quelp his bed or the price tharof betuix this and paisch

The said day James lesly forspekar for Dauid symson Jhone menyeis Wat thomson
Robert of buchan Wil anffray James andirson Wil symson Wil nory William
philp and thare complicis strekyt ane borgh in the hand of morice besat seriand that
Jhone fichet has wrangwisly and againis the law intromettit with certane gudis of
tharis out of the schip of Robert Jameson and art and part of the sellyng thareof
the quhilk the said Jhone fichet be his forspekar' gilbert the vaus' denyit / and
than the said action was put til ane assise And thareftir the said James lesly
forspekar' for the merchandis tuke toprefe this day xv dais that the said Jhone
had wranguisly intromettit with thare gudis and was art and part of the selling tharof
And Jhone Wormot forspekar for the assise deliuerit that the said Jhon' fichet suld fynd
souerty to remayn / quhil the said skippar cum or sufficent document fra him tosee how it
standis with the merchandis gudis and gif quhat intrometting the said Jhon had tharwith
And in faute of sufficent souerty Johne fichet was ordanit to remayn in the tolbuthe

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem vijo die mensis
marcij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

quo die Thomas fife comparens in Judicio optulit se pa
ratum ad sectam Willelmi moyses quo Willelmo non instan' inuenit plegium dictus thomas quod
quitus fuit a clameo dicti Willelmi tanquam isto die et quousque nouiter fuerit attachiatus

the samyn dai Jhone erskyn the spous' of Agnes spous' to vmquhile Richart
gammyl before Jhone colison and androw branche twa of the ballies in Jugement
referrit the clame made be him and in the name of his said spous' as executrix
til richart gammyl againis Dauid mathison of iiij li' til the said Dauidis aith
quhilk sworn deponit / that he was awand to vmquhile the said richart bot
iiij s' of the rest of the said sowme / quhilkis he layd doune incontinent and pait to
the said Jhone erskyn apon the common kyst the said Jhone grantand him fullely
content and assithit tweching the said clame / And dischargit the said Dauid tharof for evyr

Item the said day alexander nachty and his wif war' made quyte of the clame of the spous'
of vmquhile William malisson and of William hir' son of xxiiij s' ix d' for certan
malt be the deposicion of the said alexander and of Rob ioffray made the gret aith
gangand betwene with consent of the folowaris

Robert blindsel and alexander Westland has fundin mawnys Wormot law borgh
for thaim and thare party / that thom strakhare salbe scathles vthirwais than law wil

Wil of cadiow producit for witnes be Johne talyour' / sworn declarit that he
was present herd and saw quhen the said Jhone made condicion with William gillifr
topay him xij d' for fracht of ilke barel of nuttis that the said Jhone layd in
his schip / to fuyr to leith

Thom pyot callit as the secund dai to ansuer' to the borgh strekin be patrik badenach
for the wranguis' halding of vjxx cartis of ploddis comperit nocht / quharfor D straloch
seriand was chargit to distres him and towarn him to the next lachful day et cetera

Dauid marr' primo die vocatus responsurus plegio super eum inuento per Alexandrum marr' quod
ipse Dauid minus iuste detinet a dicto alexandro summam v librorum ad bonum compotum vel tot
salmones sicut ipse alexander emisse potuit cum tanto argento / non comparuit / precipitur dicto seriando
quod capto districto a dicto David ipsum summoneat ad proximum diem legalem tanquam 2m diem

Item eodem die thomas fife tanquam quarto et die peremptorio vocatus ad sectam Willelmi moyses
non comparuit vnde hora diei legittima expectata / Inuenit plegium dictus Willelmus in manu
Duncanj stralogh seriendi / quod causa non defensa peruenit ad suam calumpniam aduersus dictum
thomam de summa trium librarum monete scocie et vltra

Adam andirson on the ta part / and James cvmyn on the tudir part / twiching the said
adamis clame of the price of v bollis of beir' to gude count / and of the rest of ane
obligacion clamit be the said James has summittit to thaim to the determinacion of Robert
blindsel and William moyses chosin be the said James / and of Dauid mathoson and
gilbert leche chosin be the said adam for his part / the parties beand oblist thare
handis vphaldin to vndirly the deliuerence of the saidis personis quhilkis salbe sworn
todeliuer as law wil eftir thare knaulage / and to gif furth thare decrete in the
tolbuthe this dai viij dais

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies of abirdene the viij day of marche the yer'
of god et cetera lxxxiiij / William lory constitute and ordanit Johne of Knollis and Johne colisone
coniunctly and seueralie his verray lachful procuratouris actouris and factouris in al actionis concerning
him and specialy anent a schip pertening til him . quhilk he had frachtit tilhaf had
certane salmond to berwyk / todo and defend for him anent the demaning and disposi
cion of the said schip like as thai think speidful and as he mycht do in propir persoune
promittand tohald ferm and stabil quhatsumevyr thing his forsaidis procuratouris or
ony of thaim in his name in the forsaid thingis ledis tobe done

the samyn dai the assise has deliuerit that James of Kyntor sal pay to cornelis
clerk of the busch the hail some' as thai war first appoyntit on / for certane wyne
bocht fra him / except xxxiij s' salbe defalkit to the said James for the wan of the wyn

The ix dai of the moneth of marche forsaid In the court haldin be the ballies of abir
dene in the tolbuthe / the merchandis vndirwritin affermyt the borgh strekyn on thare be
half be James lesly apon Jhone fichet / anent the wranguis' intrometting with thare g
gudis and art and part of the selling tharof / that is tosay Dauid symson Johne menyes Wat
thomson James andirson Robert of bughan Wil anffray Wil symson Richert of bernys
Wil philp / richart of crafurd John grig Wil Dauyson Wil nory androw vaus Duncan smyth

the Aldirman and consel fyndis and deliueris that the preif led before thaim be James lesly
forspekar for the merchandis / is sufficent / that Jhone fichet has wranguisly intromettit
with the merchandis gudis vnto the tym that Robert Jameson skippar cum and warand the said
Jhone of the wranguis' intrometting of the said gudis
